armored.long: Passive. Reduce damage taken by 1 (minimum 0). Does not affect terrain/environmental damage.

dodge.long: Passive. Once per activation, cancel 1 Success from an incoming attack. Disabled while Shaken.

shield_wall.long: Passive. +1 Defense while adjacent to another Shield Wall model. No bonus vs Blast.

hardened.long: Passive. Ignore the first Shaken result each round.

steadfast.long: Passive. Failed Morale results in normal failure, never Panic.

take_cover.long: Reactive. Once per round. When targeted by ranged, move 2" toward cover and gain it for this attack.

suppress.long: Main Action. Ranged attack: On hit, target suffers -1 die on its next Action.

grit.long: Once Per Game. When reduced to 0 Quality, reduce to 1 instead.

unyielding.long: Passive. Cannot be pushed/pulled/repositioned by enemy abilities.

guard.long: Passive. May intercept a melee attack targeting an adjacent friendly model.

lockdown.long: Passive. Engaged enemies cannot Disengage or use free moves. Ends if model is Shaken/Moved.

shield_aura.long: Passive. Friendly units within 6" gain +1 Defense.

tough.long: Passive. When taking damage, roll 1 die per point of damage. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

tougher.long: Passive. When taking damage, roll 2 dice per point of damage. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

toughest.long: Passive. When taking damage, roll 3 dice per point of damage. Each 5+ ignores 1 damage.

regeneration.long: Passive. At start of activation, heal 1 wound on a 5+.

not_yet.long: Passive. The first time per round this unit would be reduced to 0 Quality, it remains at 1 Quality instead. At the end of its next activation, this unit is destroyed.

heroic_grit.long: Once Per Game. Ignore first wound suffered.

hold_it_together.long: Passive. When this model would test Morale, it may skip the test. If it does, it loses 1 Quality after the current activation. May not reduce Quality below 3.

bite_the_bullet.long: Once Per Game. After this unit resolves an Attack or Interact action, it may immediately take one additional action. After the second action resolves, this unit loses 1 Quality.

brace.long: Main Action. May sacrifice movement to gain +1 Defense until next activation.

bloodless.long: Passive. Immune to Venom and Blood in the Air effects. Cannot be targeted by abilities that specifically affect living creatures.

desperate_push.long: Main Action. This model may attempt an action even if it would normally be forbidden (Pinned, Suppressed, or at 0 Move). Roll as normal. If the roll produces no successes, this model loses 1 additional Quality.

blinkshift.long: Main Action. Twice per game, this unit may teleport instead of moving normally. Roll 3d6" and place the unit anywhere within that distance, ignoring terrain and units. The unit must have line of sight to the destination. On a roll of three 1s, the unit suffers 1 Strain and loses the Blinkshift ability for the rest of the game.

pressure_sealed.long: Passive. Immune to pressure, water, and depth-related environmental hazards.

built_in_respirator.long: Passive. Immune to gas, smoke, poison storms, and airborne hazard effects.

built_in_goggles.long: Passive. Immune to Blinding effects and visual-based environmental hazards.

gas_mask.long: Passive. This unit ignores Coffin Cough, Choking Dust effects and other environmental gas/smoke/toxic effects to lungs and eyes as determined by scenario rules.

witch_stitched.long: Passive. +1 Defense. Majikal stitching enhances Defense, but does not add mass. Does not reduce movement or prevent Flying.
